item.description:
Let's try out snow tubing.

About Nashoba Valley Snow Tubing Park:
Cruise the slopes of Nashoba Valley's Snow Tubing Park seven days and seven nights. Bring the family and enjoy one of the fastest-growing winter recreational activities at the largest tubing park in New England! Fifteen lanes are serviced by four lifts and maintained by Nashoba's experienced grooming fleet, the park provides ideal tubing conditions for thrill seekers of all ages. The tubing park also consists of an on sight lodge where one can sit, relax, and enjoy all the amenities of its delicious snack bar, including a full-service bar and TV for your viewing pleasure.

Price:
2 Hour Pass - $22.00

Directions:
Boston or RT. 95/128:
Take Rt. 2 West to Concord Rotary, then go West on Rt. 2A. Follow for 6.5 miles (.5 miles beyond Ski Area), the entrance to the park is on the right.

North of Boston:
Take Rt. 495 South to Exit 31. Go right off the exit. Go straight through the light and follow for 1.5 miles. The entrance is on the left.

South of Boston:
Take Rt. 495 North to Exit 31. Go left off the exit. Go straight through the light and follow for 1.5 miles. The entrance is on the left.

http://www.skinashoba...
item.name: Snow Tubing @ Nashoba Valley
